attributes.action: look into labelling of Hydrogenated fats (trans fats) along with the current 4+4 nutritional labelling recommendation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hydrogenated (trans) fats are detrimental to the country even at very low intake levels.

Along with the current voluntary recommendations to reduce trans fat levels, there should be a directive for food producers to list hydrogenated fats if they supply information for saturated fats. This will allow people to make their own informed choice as to whether or not it is suitable for their consumption.
